data.event: Just south of the town is one of the first round barns, the W. H. York Round Barn, which was built in 1895.

event.title: a great victory over the Austrians in 1796

data.event: It may have been named for the city of Lodi, Italy near Milan, Italy, where Napoleon won a great victory over the Austrians in 1796.
Once again the town's name changed in 1857 to Waterman in honor of Dr. Waterman who had opened a pork packing plant and store in town.
In 1874 an R.M. Waterman owned large coal fields north of town.
